amendment.description: To prohibit executive branch appointees or staff holding positions that give them oversight, rule-making, loan or grant-making abilities over industries or companies in which they or their spouse have a significant financial interest.

action.text: Amendment SA 1487 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 1470.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1487, under the order of 2/2/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 5.
